heading: HR01983
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY AND THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY TO JOINTLY CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED 'MISENCOUNTER' BETWEEN THE SOLDIERS AND THE POLICE IN STA. RITA, SAMAR THAT RESULTED TO THE KILLING BY ARMY TROOPS OF SIX (6) PNP PERSONNEL AND THE WOUNDING OF NINE (9) OTHERS
principal-authors: ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-07-30
history:
